Career Profile

Hi, my name is Mark Arsenault. I live in St. Catharines Ontario and work out of a home office. For many years I have had a deep passion for coding, web development, and dev culture. I have recently been working as a freelance developer, while simultaniously contributing to a number of open-source projects.

10+ years of experience in design, development, testing, implementation and maintenance of web applications, web services and APIs using a variety of technologies. Extensive knowledge in Agile, Scrum, and TDD methodologies. I pride myself on my communication and strong relationship building skills.

Working as a freelancer has allowed me to work on a number of different technologies in different markets. It’s also given me the freedom to strengthen my versitility in different areas of design and development, make though decisions, and to meet deadlines.

Full Stack Developer

Stenek Corporation
2001 - 2006

I was hired by Stenek to innovate and build a B2B web solution for their wholesale distribution division. The project was a huge undertaking, and even bigger success. Stenek.com had millions in sales from thousands of businesses in Atlantic Canada. We had all our servers (web,email,data,application) in house, and gave our customer and vendor accounts the ability to completely manage their accounts from online.

Stenek had a retail, and print/copy centre division as well. I managed, and worked at the printing divison during this time also.

Achievements:

My first job as a developer/coder; this job required constant learning, effective communication, and multi-tasking. I was the only IT professional that worked at this company during this time. The company was acquired by TNG in 2010 The experience I gained at Stenek was invaluable.
